properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kaisali aumisye mwiao
Kaisali aumisye mwiao,
ni kana andu onthe
maandikwe. x2
Kila mundu na ndua yoo
Kila mundu na ndua yoo,
andu onthe
nimaendie kuandikwa. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Yosevu niwaambatie,
kuma Nasaleti
Yosevu niwaambatie
athi Yutia,
ndua ya Ndaviti Bethlemu. x2
Maendie na muka Meli
ula wamwivaitye
nake ai muito. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mekalite Bethlemu. x2
Mekalite Bethlemu
matuku mosyaa ni mavikie.
Niwasyaie kana kavisi,
niwasyaie kana kavisi
akavwikie ngua sya ukenge.
Akakomisye muvalatini,
akakomisye muvalatini
nundu nyumba nisyausuite.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mulaika wa Mwiai. x2
niwamaumilile aithi
utuku mayiithya weuni.
Utheu mutisu wamamulika,
utheu mutisu wamamulika
nimakwatiwe, ni wia mwingi.
Niwameie ekai ukia,
niwameie ekai ukia
ninamuetee uvoo Museo.
